search.name: Age Calculator
search.description:
Calculate age between two dates. The start date is specified first and if no end date is specified, the current date is used for the end date.
Examples:
age startDate [endDate]
age 1 Feb 1954 8/22/1979
age 1 Feb 1954 22 August 1979
age 1 Feb 1954 22 Aug 1979
age 12 Feb 1927
age 2/12/1927
